title: Israel’s Journey Reviewed
summary: Numbers 33 lists every stop Israel made from Egypt to the edge of the Promised Land. God commands them to drive out the Canaanites when they enter the land and warns of consequences if they fail to do so.

faq.question: Why is the journey recorded in detail?
faq.answer: To remind Israel of God’s faithfulness and guidance throughout the wilderness.

faq.question: What warning does God give?
faq.answer: If Israel does not drive out the Canaanites, they will become a snare and cause trouble.
